Rulings.Base: 1. Halving the ATK and DEF of "Vice Dragon" happens as part of the inherent Special Summon. When "Vice Dragon" successfully Special Summoned with its own effect, its ATK will be 1000 and its DEF will be 1200.\n2. You cannot Special Summon "Vice Dragon" while "Testudo erat Numen" is on the field.

PSCT.Base: If your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand), but its original ATK and DEF become halved.
